Text: The Prismatic World Tour was the third concert tour by American singer-songwriter Katy Perry, in support of her fourth studio album, "Prism" (2013).

Text: Prismatic World Tour:  The tour began on May 7, 2014, in Belfast, Northern Ireland at the Odyssey Arena, concluding on October 18, 2015, in Alajuela, Costa Rica at Parque Viva after six legs.
